title: Athenian Rhapsody
description:
Athenian Rhapsody is a fresh comedic RPG game in which you’ll explore the World of Athens Your goal is to build your very own Rhapsody, the story of you (the player) and your epic tale in this world. Your story will unfold based on your decisions, to the degree of which cannot be replicated by any other player. A Rhap is a turn based RPG which includes intense and fast paced real-time-dodging.
You’ll be faced with many challenges, and you’ll have to fight your way through the world by either fighting , or awkwardly trying to make friends with your opponents through pick-up-lines, mean jokes, memory games, and other strange and funny interactions. Movies Tycoon

system_requirements.Processor: 3 Nasa Supercomputers Plugged into Each Other
